credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Knife
description: Sabre-shaped blade, drop bolster. Ferrule engraved with animals and flowers; ferrule and bolster gilded. Porcelain handle tapering, round in section. Floral pattern in blue, red, green, yellow and purple on a white ground. Button cap on top of handle.
name: Knife
